jobs.title: Senior Java geek required with practical knowledge in blockchain
jobs.description:
Panaroma Finance is the worlds leading blockchain-based cryptocurrency exchange platform. Its headquarters in Dubai. We deal with digital currencies that are prevalent around the world, such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, and other digital currencies at face value. 
We are looking for a Java/Full stack Developer (SDE roles) for Product engineering team with experience in building high-performing, scalable, enterprise-grade applications. 
You will be part of a talented software team that works on mission-critical applications. Java developer roles and responsibilities include managing Java application development while providing expertise in the full software development lifecycle, from concept and design to testing. 
Java developer responsibilities include designing, developing and delivering high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems.

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Analyst - Threat Detection
jobs.description: Join our cybersecurity team in London and help protect our organization from cyber threats. We're seeking a Cybersecurity Analyst with expertise in threat detection and incident response.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer - Ruby on Rails
jobs.description: Join our startup team in Austin and work on building web applications using Ruby on Rails. We're seeking a Full Stack Developer with expertise in frontend and backend development.

jobs.title: iOS App Developer - Swift
jobs.description: Join our mobile app development team in Sydney and create exceptional iOS applications. We're looking for an iOS App Developer proficient in Swift and iOS development.

jobs.title: AI Research Scientist - Natural Language Processing
jobs.description: Join our AI research lab in Silicon Valley and work on advancing NLP skills. We're seeking an AI Research Scientist with expertise in Python, NLP, and deep learning.

jobs.title: Backend Developer - Node.js
jobs.description: Join our development team in Toronto and work on building scalable backend systems using Node.js. We're looking for a Backend Developer experienced in REST APIs and database management.

jobs.title: Senior DevOps Engineer - Kubernetes Specialist
jobs.description: We're a tech company in Seattle seeking a Senior DevOps Engineer with expertise in Kubernetes and cloud infrastructure. Help us optimize our CI/CD pipelines and deployment processes.

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer - Mobile App Development
jobs.description: Join our design team in Berlin and shape the user experience for our mobile applications. We're seeking a talented UX/UI Designer proficient in Figma and mobile app design.

jobs.title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Specialist
jobs.description: Join our data science team in London and work on cutting-edge machine learning projects. We're looking for a Data Scientist with expertise in Python, TensorFlow, and deep learning.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer - React.js
jobs.description: We're a fast-growing e-commerce company based in OFFERED York. We're looking for a skilled Frontend Developer with expertise in React.js to enhance our user interfaces and create seamless shopping experiences.
